title: One Piece Episode #506 Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A review of Episode 506 from the original air date, discussing how the Straw Hats handle the news about Ace's death. The review notes the episode's shift back to the present after the extended backstory with Luffy, Ace and Sabo.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains discussion of events through Episode 506

title: One Piece Reaction Mashup Episode 506 - Straw Hats Find Out About Ace's Death
author: Various Reactors
description: A compilation of various reactors watching Episode 506 and their emotional responses to the Straw Hat crew members learning about Ace's death.

title: Rayleigh has a PLAN || One Piece Episode 506, 507 & 508 REACTION + REVIEW
author: RuffSenpai
description: A reaction and review video covering Episodes 506-508, focusing on the Straw Hats learning about the war and Rayleigh's plan for Luffy.

title: CREW LEARNS ABOUT LUFFY | One Piece Episode 506 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Couples Reaction Channel
description: A couples reaction and discussion video for Episode 506, focusing on how the crew learns about Luffy's situation after the war at Marineford.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 506 REACTION!
author: According to Lucky
description: A Patreon-exclusive reaction video to One Piece Episode 506, showing the reactor's emotional response to the Straw Hats learning about Ace's death.

title: ONE PIECE - Episode 505 - 506 (UNCUT REACTION)

description: An uncut reaction video covering Episodes 505-506, showing the full emotional journey of watching these pivotal post-war episodes.

title: One Piece Episode 506 UNCUT REACTION!

title: One Piece Episode 506 - Straw Hats in Shock! The Bad News Has Reached Them!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 506 on Crunchyroll, showing the Straw Hat crew members' reactions to learning about Ace's death at Marineford.
